mainText:
In a sentence, 

"He changed the world.  My world." Thank you, Steve.  You've NO idea how much of a legacy you have.  Millions of people  just like me, will bask in it every day.  You have no idea how much you will be missed by the millions of us who never even got to know you personally.  You never knew me, yet, you changed my life.

A heartfelt, thanks.  You will be sorely missed.
author: Bronson
